name: HULT
description: HULT believe that theory is good, but practice is better. Hult strives to create a better future for all by inspiring and challenging everyone in our community to make an impact that matters. With a program offering from undergraduate through to doctorate level and a global campus network that spans six cities across three continents, Hult has pioneered learning-by-doing since its foundation. Home to a multicultural community of forward-thinking business talent and top-ranked by the Financial Times, the Economist, Forbes, and Bloomberg Businessweek, Hult gives students the knowledge and skills to become thriving business leaders and entrepreneurs. Founded by one of Europe's most successful entrepreneurs, Bertil Hult, we believe in the universal truth that to master a skill-from riding a bike to leading a team-it must be practiced.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Hult is the business school for those made to do.
ShortDescription: With a program offering from undergraduate through to doctorate level and a global campus network that spans six cities across three continents, Hult has pioneered learning-by-doing since its foundation.

Highlights.name: Do challenges
Highlights.description: Creative problem-solving and collaboration are essential to personal and professional success. Our students continually practice what they’ll be doing in the workplace so they build a relevant skillset that enables them to take on any challenge they may face after graduation.

Highlights.name: Do global
Highlights.description: Immersed in a melting pot of 150 nationalities across a global campus network, Hult graduates don’t just thrive in an international environment, they know how to leverage it to get results.

Highlights.name: Do growth
Highlights.description: Change never stops and neither should learning. Whether our graduates’ goals change, or their industry does, our lifelong learning options enable them to come back to Hult every year for the rest of their career in order to stay up to date and relevant—always.

enhanced_description: Hult is a top-ranked global business school specializing in practical, learning-by-doing education, offering programs from undergraduate through to doctorate level. With a global campus network spanning six cities across three continents, Hult fosters a multicultural community of over 150 nationalities, focused on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency. Its unique approach emphasizes creative problem-solving through challenges, global immersion, and lifelong learning, preparing students to become thriving business leaders and entrepreneurs ready for global career opportunities. Hult is recognized for its excellence by leading publications such as the Financial Times, The Economist, Forbes, and Bloomberg Businessweek.
